Detailed Description

Data generated when a Pokémon is added to a trainer's party in Generation III.

All of this information is generated from values stored in struct pksav_gen2_pc_pokemon.

Field Documentation

◆ condition

uint8_t pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data::condition

The Pokémon's status ailments, if any.

The enum ::struct pksav_gb_condition contains all valid values for this field.

◆ unused

uint8_t pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data::unused

Unused.

◆ current_hp

uint16_t pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data::current_hp

The Pokémon's current HP.

This value should never be higher than struct pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data.max_hp.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ max_hp

uint16_t pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data::max_hp

The Pokémon's maximum HP.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base HP stat, HP EV, and HP IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ atk

uint16_t pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data::atk

The Pokémon's Attack.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base Attack stat, Attack EV, and Attack IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ def

uint16_t pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data::def

The Pokémon's Defense.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base Defense stat, Defense EV, and Defense IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ spd

uint16_t pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data::spd

The Pokémon's Speed.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base Speed stat, Speed EV, and Speed IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ spatk

uint16_t pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data::spatk

The Pokémon's Special Attack.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base Special Attack stat, Special EV, and Special IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.

◆ spdef

uint16_t pksav_gen2_pokemon_party_data::spdef

The Pokémon's Special Defense.

This value is calculated using the Pokémon's base Special Defense stat, Special EV, and Special IV.

This value should be accessed and set with pksav_bigendian16.
